summary: The implementation fully addresses all BuildRequest requirements. The website includes a professional homepage with company credentials, About section, Services section, Contact form with backend storage, and a warm earthy color scheme appropriate for a construction business. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

hallucinated_features.description: Phone field in contact form (REQ-4 specifies name, email, phone, message, but implementation only has name, companyName, email, message)
hallucinated_features.reason: Contact form includes 'companyName' field instead of the requested 'phone' field
